name: Breakout 3D (Scinacz)
description:
This game was made in 5 or less hours.

Its breakout from atari but in 3D or something.

(Yes i know i did the title wrong in the game, too lazy to change it)

Controls:

E - Front View
Q - Side View
WASD - Movement
R - Reset (I Think)
U - Top View
ESCAPE - Quit To Main Menu
